metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12394 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A logic flaw in our location bar implementation could have allowed a local attacker to spoof the current location by selecting a different origin and removing focus from the input element. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 76.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-12394` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-geckodriver - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 76.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '76.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
